title: 250-msec cross track ion drift velocities - Rod Heelis (University of Texas, Dallas)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch_velZ' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/de/de2/plasma_idm/vion250ms_cdaweb/1981/de2_vion250ms_idm_19810815_v01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 49.9306% of the 1439 timesteps. Cadence = 125 [ms] = PT0.125S.
info.contact: Rod Heelis @ University of Texas, Dallas

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: NSSDC standard-reference time value (ion velocity) Z direction.

parameters.name: ionVelocityZ
parameters.description: Ion velocity in s/c z direction - vi_z - app. horizontal

parameters.name: dataQualityZ
parameters.description: Data quality flag for vi_z (0-1: good; 2-3: averaging recom.; 4-5: unreliable
